title: Hydrological Model - ClarkUnitStand
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of ClarkUnitStandard entity, which describes the standard synthetic Clark Unit Hydrograph method (it produces a unit hydrograph that theoretically has an infinite number of ordinates). It is associated with the Subasin entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be ClarkUnitStand

method.enum: A text defining the method used for the Clark Unit hydrograph transformation

timeOfConc.type: A number defining the maximum travel time in the subbasin. Units: Hours

timeAreaMethod.enum: A text defining the time-area curve used

storageCoef.type: A number defining the time water can remain in the basin. Units: Hours
